gw.api.archiving

Class ArchiveDocumentReferencesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.archiving.ArchiveDocumentReferencesUtil

  • public final class ArchiveDocumentReferencesUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for retrieving information based on ArchiveDocumentReferences and ArchiveDocumentReferenceItem.

    • Method Detail

      • isReferenceTrackingInSync

        public static boolean isReferenceTrackingInSync()
        Determines whether the archive reference table is in sync with the archive document store. Purge and other data destruction operations should not be performed until the archive reference table is in sync with the archive document store.
        Returns:
        true if the archive reference table is in sync with the archive document store
        See Also:
        BatchProcessType.TC_ARCHIVEREFERENCETRACKINGSYNC

      • isReferencedFromArchiveDocument

        public static boolean isReferencedFromArchiveDocument(KeyableBean bean)
        Determines whether or not the given bean is referenced from within some archive document.
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to check
        Returns:
        true if there is an archive document that references this bean

      • isReferencedFromArchiveDocument

        public static boolean isReferencedFromArchiveDocument(java.util.Collection<? extends KeyableBean> beans)
        Determines whether any of the beans in the given collection is referenced from any archive document.
        Parameters:
        beans - collection of beans to check
        Returns:
        true if any bean in the collection is referenced from any archive document

      • getRootPublicIDsOfArchiveDocumentsReferencing

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getRootPublicIDsOfArchiveDocumentsReferencing(KeyableBean bean)
        Gets the root public IDs of all archive documents from which the given bean is referenced.
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to check
        Returns:
        list of archive document root public IDs

      • getRootPublicIDsOfArchiveDocumentsReferencing

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getRootPublicIDsOfArchiveDocumentsReferencing(java.util.Collection<? extends KeyableBean> beans)
        Gets the root public IDs of all archive documents from which the given collection of beans is referenced.
        Parameters:
        beans - the beans to check
        Returns:
        list of archive document root public IDs
